content.prompt: The conflict described in the excerpt is most similar to conflict in what other period?

choices.label: The period from after the Seven Yearsâ€™ War through the 1760s
The period from after the War of 1812 through the 1820s

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
